qas.question: What did Adolf Hitler have a lifelong romantic fascination with?
Where did Adolf Hitler establish a home in the 1930s?
When was Adolf Hitlers first visit to the Alps?

context: <a0_0>Austrian<a0_0/>-born Adolf Hitler had a lifelong romantic fascination with <a1_0>the Alps<a1_0/> and by the 1930s established a home in <a2_0>the Obersalzberg region<a2_0/> outside of Berchtesgaden. His first visit to the area was in <a3_0>1923<a3_0/> and he maintained a strong tie there until the end of his life. At the end of World War II the US Army occupied Obersalzberg, to prevent Hitler from retreating with the Wehrmacht into the mountains.
